# Contributing

Thank you for your contribution! Please read CONTRIBUTING.md.

## Checklist
- [ ] Objective (one sentence)
- [ ] Scope (files/dirs)
- [ ] Model routing noted
- [ ] Validation: lint, tests, dry-run
- [ ] Risks and rollback

## Changes
- Summary:
- Screenshots/Logs:

## Validation
- Lint/Test output:
- Manual checks:

## Approvals
- Reviewers:
- Approvals required:
